item.title: Overview
item.description: Overview Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: This document needs to be thoroughly reexamined. We need to remove content not related to API Access Management such as content that discusses Web apps and OIDC. Also, we need a complete answer to what this doc is trying to accomplish. Links to original docs: - API Access Management with Okta: https://developer.

item.title: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API
item.description: Add OAuth access token support to your Rest API Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: - Protect your API endpoints:Â https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/protect-your-api/aspnetcore3/main/ Why is this here?: A majority of oktane customers placed “API Service Integration” under “Authentication for service apps” Structure type: Task Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code.
